showerReviews.reviewText: This is my tird time up here and I LOVE IT, 5 Pumps for diesel, Plenty room for parking, Very Clean Showers, laundry, nice shopping with hot food area, they have a pizza, Sandwich place in the same building, they have a chinesse food across ‚Ä¶

With occasional fluctuating temperatures in the shower -usually I have a pleasant experience here. Temperatures in the shower today are extremely cold. I would take the 10$ refund offered FOR NOT SHOWERING, however there were conversations ‚Ä¶
Needed to take a shower before my next load... the shower was not clean, had hair in the drain and spread throughout. The sink was the same way. Trash was overflowing. So disappointing
Best truck stop they have shower a Italian  pizza end that best cold cut  Italian sandwich

Shower was nasty, mildewed, and cracked. Shower curtain was pink and slimy, towels and washcloths were dingy, stained and stank, except for the floor mats which were surprisingly white in comparison. The vents were clogged with dust.  Absol ‚Ä¶
Super service, hot shower, delicious food, save ambient

So the well ran dry on are property where we live, and someone told us s that we can shower at the circle k truck stop in Auburn. They said it's clean and they provide towels and it's only $10 for about 45 minutes. And they were right! This ‚Ä¶
Love this place. Especially love the fact that you can pay $10 to take a nice hot shower!!
Great spot for truckers, shower $10; tasty pizza, and some decent food selection, including breakfast. Spots get full quick, no spots after 7pm. I guess, because it's a gem of neighborhood.

Good place to stop. Clean parking lot. Good customer service. üëçüèΩ Store was clean and the morning crew was on it with hot food. Shower I had was very clean but the water pressure was low. CAT scales seems good if you‚Äôre loading out. ‚Ä¶
$10 shower, do your laundry in air conditioned TV lounge.  Friendly helpful staff.  Definitely will utilize services here when on the road working.
Clean hot showers, towels and some soap provided. $10 per shower , not bad. Food looked good, but I wasn't hungry. Some truckerparking available. Nice staff. Thank you!

‚Ä¶ too on my entire trip. I was so thankful to Heaven for making sure that the shower's are very clean and looking good for us customer's whether it be a trucker or just a traveler passing through like me. So kudo's to this place for ‚Ä¶
Shower was gross. Called corporate to send pictures and hopefully get it cleaned up!
Beautiful shower and nice place

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ freshen up a bit wash their face and brush their teeth comb their hair. Now to do a simple wash of the face u have to pay for a shower room which is not cheap. There is no bathroom for truck drivers and unless you fill your truck here u ‚Ä¶

Usually would give a 5 rating, but after paying $11.50 for a shower and using the toilet to realize they're is an empty roll of toilet tissue,and no spare one makes for a not  happy camper...plse pay more attention!!! ‚Ä¶

Good shower.  Real hot, real powerful.

Do us all a favour: splurge and pay for two showers if there‚Äôs two of you.  Keep this place around.

Besides, room is a LITTLE small for two people to operate.

Stopped here last night on our way to Ontario for a much needed nap and a shower. The staff are friendly, huge parking lot, restaurant, timmies inside, very clean washrooms and showers (showers cost $11.50, towels and soap dispenser in ‚Ä¶
Cool place lots of parking but it fills up fast a night clean shower's timmy s an a pirate seafood restaurant and they all will speak English to you with out being snobby about it very friendly

I went for paid shower today, but cashier told me it  is only for truck drivers, but there is no policy of Petro pass, like only drivers are eligible.
Pathetic
Dirty & Slow Showers. Hair all over the floor. Nobody cares to clean them. ‚Ä¶
Petro pass with 3 diesel fuel islands, average clean showers and restrooms. You will get a shower and coffee or tea by fueling 200 ltrs. Ample parking spaces for semi trucks
Nice staff , shower is available very clean, restaurant is also inside store . Easy to park your truck and take rest .

‚Ä¶ associated with Petro-Pass for over a decade,I believe a fuel receipt over 200 litters can be use to avail a free shower from any Petro-Pass in Canada within 24 hours.For the first time in my years of trucking I was RUDELY DENIED a shower ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This place used to be good but they have changed their policy with the showers. They say it is for truck drivers only. I have never had a problem coming here in the middle of the night and paying for a shower. Even the manager said he ‚Ä¶

Last night I looked up your business on the internet and it states that you guys have showers. For both motorists and truckers? I was passing through in need of a shower it was a long hot day I stopped at your business. I went up to the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is super friendly and courteous. I shower here and the shower was big, water temperature was easy to use and it was not 100% clean but I‚Äôm used too so not a problem for me (same like any other truck stop). Finally they had a lot of ‚Ä¶
Good size lot for tractor trailer parking. Nice shower rooms. They need to do a better job cleaning the shower rooms. Mold and mildew are becoming an issue.
Free shower with a 75 gallon fuel receipt (valid for 5 days). Free parking and lots of backing space. Free wifi. Plenty of food inside. It's a good truck stop. I prefer it over the cramped TA in NH.

Waited over a hour and half for a shower they were giving shower time to other people who singed up after me.. than they didn't leave me any towels good thing I noticed that before I showered.. -2 Stars
How is very good food need more than one shower
Nice, clean lots of parking spots, friendly staff, only shower could be better

showerReviews.reviewText: i stopped here 20.12 pm 20 may 2025 for shower and lady on the cashier counter is rude ‚Ä¶
Wonderful rest stop. Huge variety of food, nice bathroom, free shower!
Stopped for fuel up , filled 55 gallons as it was less busy asked for shower üöø, they denied reasons being fill at least 75 gallons then they can give the shower ‚Ä¶

The shower was fantastic! Very clean and nice. Staff were kind and helpful. Got a veggie pizza from the restaurant afterwards, which I struggled to finish. It was delicious. Highly recommend stopping here for rest and refreshment.

‚Ä¶ hands on my biscuits/WHAT. I just picked up my bags and walked out NO SALE. Great place to get fuel, take a shower and park, but don't eat their if you don't want salmonella... In lamines terms it's called cross contamination(((Google it)))

The shower ISN‚ÄôT free, i took one here like 3-4 days ago and it was $10. I know some other reviews say that the shower are free, but that must be an old policy because they change now. Aside from that I have zero complaints.
Excellent quick stop for Gas, Food, Bathroom, Drinks (including Adult Drinks), and even a shower [$10, 30 minute time-limit].
Clean spacious bathrooms and free shower! Whaaaaa??!! Store is AC‚Äôd with a wide selection of food, drinks and knickknacks. Lobster rolls!
Clean restrooms, nice shower, and the Lobster Rolls was good! Also very friendly people...
Awesome small store.  Free shower.  Definately great small spot for truckers
